answers.project_description: A custom Shopify Hydrogen storefront for "Druid and Bear" brand.
answers.problem_statement: Provides a premium, performance-optimized shopping experience for high-end wellness products.
answers.target_users: Health-conscious consumers who prioritize high-performance wellness through wild-sourced, functional ingredients.
key_goals: Maximize conversion rates for the core honey collection.
Educate users on the scientific benefits of Lion's Mane, Reishi, and Cordyceps.
Establish a premium "Lux-Noir" aesthetic that justifies a high price point.
answers.voice_and_tone: Concise, benefit-driven, and direct, optimized for SEO and accessibility while remaining user-friendly.
answers.design_principles: Minimal Dark Aesthetics (Lux-Noir), Stylized Benefit Clarity, High-Fidelity brand storytelling.
answers.tdd_strictness: Moderate - tests encouraged, especially for core logic and UI components.
